resources.string:
You can view this again in the about screen.



1.6 B3 (Beta Release)
  • NEW: Complete redesign of settings - Now tabbed and easier to access
  • NEW: New material design animations
  • NEW: Configure web head size
  • NEW: 5.0+ Web head now has realistic drop shadow
  • NEW: 5.0+ Merge tabs and tabs - Each recent card will have icon and title of the web site. Other issues fixed.
  • IMPROVED: Custom tab opening speed
  • IMPROVED: Smoother fling animations
  • IMPROVED: Tweaked web head close and reveal animations
  • IMPROVED: Search view UI.
  • FIXED: Icons getting cut on N


1.6 B2 (Beta Release)
  • NEW: Much improved web heads\' physics based animations.
  • NEW: Favicon support for web heads.
  • NEW: Custom Tab Bottom bar.
  • NEW: Open in new tab (5.0+): Copy a link or text while browsing and press the + icon to launch in a new tab.
  • FIX: Lots of internal optimizations.
  • IMPROVED: Home screen shortcuts will now have title and icon extracted from the website.
  • IMPROVED: Synced translation updates.


1.6 B1 (Beta Release)
  • NEW: Ability to fling web heads around.
  • NEW: For 5.0+ : Experimental merge tab and apps, each tab will appear as separate task.
  • IMPROVED: Minor UI interactions.
  • NEW: Synced translation updates from OneSky: German, Russian, Portuguese BR, Chinese, Italian.
  • FIX: Minor fixes in extracting colors from apps.


1.5.5.1
  • NEW: Configure animation speed, choose between medium and short.
  • NEW: Ability to turn off Chromer Scanning notification.
  • FIX: Open in Chrome not working if Merge Tabs and Apps in Chrome was on.
  • FIX: Blacklist FC.


1.5.5
  • FIX: Pre-fetching crash fixes for Samsung devices.
  • FIX: Crash when enabling dynamic toolbar for < 5.0 devices.
  • FIX: Blacklisting issues on Custom Tab enabled apps. Thanks to user - SpaceBison.
  • FIX: Springy animation when web heads attach to screen sides.
  • FIX: Open in Chrome menu taking to Chrome home screen.
  • IMPROVED: Faster custom tab opening animation.


1.5.4
  • NEW: Blacklisting: ability to launch your secondary browser instead of Chromer in certain apps.
  • NEW: \'X\' will be shown in search bar to quickly clear text while typing.
  • NEW: Launching url from main screen now respects web heads preference.
  • NEW: Much improved pre-fetch content. Optimized for memory and battery and shows a notification when links are pre-fetched.
  • NEW: OneSky translation link in about screen; do help translate Chromer to your language by contributing as a translator.
  • FIX: “Open in Chromer” issue. Separate Open in Chrome entry will be shown now.
  • IMPROVED: Tablet layout.
  • FIX: Janky scrolling in Chromer main screen.
  • FIX: Layout issues when font size is increased.
  • FIX: Secondary browser opening link twice.
  • FIX: Major optimizations and memory leak fixes.


1.5.3
  • FIX: Chromer not shown in recents on some devices.
  • FIX: Crashes and minor bugs.


1.5.2
  • NEW: Option to join beta program. Please join if you would like to contribute to Chromer\'s development.
  • IMPROVED: Minor improvements to web heads snapping to trash and webhead physics.
  • FIX: Chromer getting disappeared from recents view.
  • FIX: Open in Chromer is shown in Chrome beta and dev versions. Now a separate Open in Chrome will be shown.
  • FIX: Crashes and minor bugs.


1.5.1
  • NEW: Ability to choose color of web heads.
  • NEW: Ability to close all webheads from notification bar.
  • IMPROVED: Webheads dragging. Webheads now snap to trash when near.
  • IMPROVED: Scrolling behaviour in Chromer settings screen.
  • FIX: Not able to perform search on some keyboards. Now search icon will be shown on your keyboard, press that to launch URL or search.
  • FIX: Crash when trying to install Chrome from dialog.
  • FIX: Multiple crashes related to webheads.
  • FIX: Chromer settings appearing randomly when closing custom tabs.
  • FIX: For 6.0+, re ask permission to draw on other apps if it was revoked with webheads turned on.


1.5
  • NEW: WEBHEADS - Ability to stack multiple links in floating bubbles and open them later. See the separate Intro in main screen.
  • NEW: Configurable action item in custom tab. Choose between secondary browser and any sharing app. Example: Choose Pocket to instantly save the link.
  • NEW: Ability to do text and voice search from main screen with the new material design search bar.
  • NEW: Dynamic toolbar enhanced. Now can adapt color based on the launching app\'s color.
  • NEW: Launch screen, new icon and app intro.
  • IMPROVED: Better app pickers
  • IMPROVED: Sharing a non url text to Chromer will now do a Google search. Also in text selection pop up in 6.0
  • IMPROVED: Setting default behaviour on Cyanogen devices
  • IMPROVED: Improved warm up and pre-fetch performance on non Chrome browsers
  • IMPROVED: Reduced memory consumptions and general crash fixes
  • IMPROVED: UI layout changes


1.4.1
  • Rewritten affected code to avoid potential license violations.


1.4
  • NEW: Pre fetching. Chromer can scan links on screen and pre load them in background for you.
  • NEW: Option to keep browser warmed up. Improves launch times!
  • NEW: Dynamic toolbar color. Chromer can provide color based on the website, if the website has it.
  • NEW: Secondary browser option. Quickly get to your preferred app.
  • NEW: Add to home screen option.
  • IMPROVED: More material design
  • IMPROVED: Better setting default behaviour.
  • IMPROVED: Copy and share actions now target the current open page instead of first open page.


1.3
  • DONATE option. Please donate if you like this app and to support development:)
  • Share links to open in Chromer
  • For 6.0, select a text link to open in Chromer
  • Option to choose between multiple Chrome versions
  • About screen
  • Link to Chromer G+ community
  • Changelog screen
  • Link to Chrome in case no custom tab provider is found


1.2.1
  • Reworked share menu. Direct share enabled for 6.0


1.2
  • Change Toolbar color to your liking.
  • Configure animations.
  • Link to read about chrome custom tabs.
  • Option to share Chromer link to others.
  • Licenses dialog.
  • Tutorial flow performance fixes.
  • Icons and imagery updated.


1.1
  • Much requested copy and share options


1.0
  • Initial release.
